Description:
WELCOME TO ELTRYM ON OVER ½ AN ACRE
‘Eltrym’ was originally built around the 1940’s & overtime has been the centre of many happy family memories. The character & charm of this weatherboard home creates an ambience of both comfort & space with high ceilings, spacious living areas, hardwood timber floors, double hung windows & a picture perfect view from every window of the greenery & privacy that surrounds. Partially renovated the home offers a beautiful new kitchen with stainless steel double oven, renovated ensuite, a new roof, concrete stumps, new gas ducted heating, re-wiring with new light fixtures & painted throughout internally. There are still a few items to be completed but at this price it certainly won’t last long! The floorplan offers a spacious master bedroom, large light filled living areas which includes a separate dining/family room & a big games room/workshop downstairs plus car accommodation. Nestled on over ½ an acre which offers plenty of useable sunny space, a chook pen, cubby house, vegie patch & secure yard for the kids & pets to play. Be quick to inspect this one!
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure that the open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
Peace & Privacy On 1/2 An Acre!
Perfectly located in the sunny hills town of Cockatoo, you will find this stunning split level cedar weatherboard home perfect for the family or first home buyer. Featuring polished floorboards throughout, large living room and 3 generously sized bedrooms with built in robes, 2 of which lead out onto the decked entertaining area perfect for entertaining family and friends all year round. Boasting a spacious kitchen with plenty of cupboard space, meals/dining area, gas ducted heating, split system heating and cooling this home is ready to move in and enjoy. Outside you will find a beautiful 1/2 acre (2144m2) approx. allotment insuring plenty of privacy, terraced levels, a stunning picturesque outlook, large driveway and single garage with workshop. Homes like this don’t last long, call us for an inspection today!
Due to strong market conditions please call before the open to confirm that it is still going ahead.

Description:
'Springfern' - Rural Retreat with Total Privacy and Northerly Aspect
Set on approximately 66 acres with the majority rolling pastures with a few acres of bush and 6 dams, this architecturally designed home is the ideal lifestyle getaway. The house is stretched out over approximately 50 squares of zoned living spaces including the huge games room with wet bar that is ideal for entertaining as it opens out to the paved area surrounding the inground pool. There are 5 bedrooms including master with walk in robe, ensuite and parents retreat/study, whilst the other bedrooms are discretely zoned away from the main entertaining area and have their own separate living room and bathroom. Entertaining is a delight with the central large kitchen opening onto a deck near the pool and also overlooking the dining and lounge room with its wood heater. Outside there is a large barn with mezzanine level, concrete floor and power, machinery shed, 2 cattle crush yards, horse shelters and 11 paddocks. Special features include beautiful recycled timbers including oregon, jarrah and ironbark, 2 hot water services, 3 bathrooms and 4 toilets, beautiful stone fireplace, wood heater, zoned slab heating, dishwasher, double lock up garage, 20,000 gallon water tanks, fish pond and so much more!!!. Don't hesitate to inspect this home that offers so many benefits close to the great hills townships of Cockatoo, Gembrook & Emerald - all this is less than 1 hours drive from Melbourne!
Contact Mick Dolphin on 0429684522 or Dineke Simpson on 0433 658 777 to arrange your inspection today!
Due to strong market conditions please call before the open to confirm that it is still going ahead.

Description:
PRIVATELY LOCATED WITH A 4 CAR GARAGE ON HALF AN ACRE (APPROX.)
Set on a usable half acre block is this low maintenance brick home. Ideal for the first home buyer, downsizer or investor, this home consists of 3 large bedrooms all with built in robes, generous updated bathroom including a spa bath, gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, 2.2kw solar capacity and modern kitchen with dishwasher. From inside to out the features continue with a large decked entertaining area that is surrounded by beautiful established gardens and creek running through the back of the property, 4 car garage with remote entry and workshop, plus the back yard is fully fenced, has a sealed drive and under house storage. All these features and many more so be quick to inspect as it won't last long.
Contact Mick Dolphin on 0429 684 522 or Dineke Simpson on 0433 658 777 to arrange an inspection now.

Description:
The Ultimate In Lifestyle With Huge Sheds!
From the moment you arrive you are sure to be impressed by this magnificent property that has been designed around family lifestyle and with a tradesman in mind. The perfectly presented family home is spread over 2 levels and ensures everyone has their own space and features a stylish master bedroom complete with WIR and full ensuite, spacious lounge, well-appointed modern kitchen with quality appliances, large adjoining dining room, a kid’s wing that includes 3 bedrooms and rumpus/play room. Special features include a study/office, gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, polished timber floors, soaring high ceilings, light modern colour scheme throughout, quality carpets and drapes and large windows that overlook the gardens and allow plenty of natural light to flow through the home. Outside the stunning flat and landscaped allotment of almost 3/4 of an acre is feature packed with manicured lawn areas, carefully planned established gardens, feature pond, sealed driveways and sealed paths that wind through the property. Also on offer is triple driveway access, a huge shed 7m X 11m with concrete floor, power, mezzanine level and a double carport at the front, 4 car garage, a double carport attached to the house and to complete this magnificent package is a covered outdoor entertaining area with built in open fire and café blinds, meaning you can entertain in style all year round. All of this on a quiet no through road. Call today inspection is a must!!!
Due to strong market conditions, please call ahead to confirm open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
Fantastic Lifestyle Opportunity!
Looking for a leafy lifestyle change without the million dollar price tag?
Set on an impressive 2600m2 (approx) Cleared block, this freshly renovated 4 bedroom home offers a great lifestyle opportunity and boasts an array of features which include:
* 4 Spacious bedrooms â?? Master with full ensuite, Spa and WIR, Second bathroom servicing remaining bedrooms.
* Brand new kitchen with quality SS Westinghouse appliances, soft close draws, Stone bench tops & Window servery opening out to the impressive undercover alfresco area that overlooks the western boundary of the property.
* Two separate living zones, both with split system A/C as well as additional meals area.
* Coonara wood fire heating in the main lounge with a heat transfer system.
* 8m x 6m (approx) Enclosed workshop featuring power & concrete flooring, with adjoining 12m x 8m (approx) Undercover lean-to suitable to house additional vehicles or work machinery.
* Less than 3kms to Cockatoos main town ship and approx 15 mins drive to Pakenham and the M1 Freeway.
With its list of inclusions, location and cleared usable land which also has access to Cockatoo Creek running along the western boundary, this beautiful home will be sure to impress!
Call Brad Townsend today to arrange your private inspection.

Description:
Perfectly Located Investor, First Home or Downsizer!
Centrally located on a lovely, flat quarter acre with established trees & gardens & lush lawns, this low maintenance home is literally a 1 minute walk to the Primary School, the shops & restaurants in Cockatoo or Public Transport, making it a sensational investment opportunity or conveniently located home. There are 3 robed bedrooms, an open plan living & dining area with a convenient gas heater & an air conditioner for comfort, a well-appointed kitchen with dishwasher & breakfast bar & a laundry, family bathroom & separate toilet. Outside you can relax on the undercover rear deck with bubbling built in spa overlooking your lush backyard with double carport, a garden shed & under house storage. The property is fully fenced with gravel drive & mains water, gas & electricity connected. Neat, well located & comfortable, this property will not last long so dont hesitate; call to arrange a private inspection today!

Description:
CHARACTER, SPACE & SECLUSION ON OVER 15 ACRES!
Built with an obvious passion for character & charm of years gone by, this beautiful weatherboard family residence stands proudly on over 15 acres. Surrounded by complete serenity, your neighbours are the local wildlife that also call this paradise home. The original section of this home was relocated from Blackburn & dates back to the early 1920’s. If size is important then the expansive floorplan will suit just about any family requirements with 4 generous bedrooms plus separate study area, the master offers ensuite, walk in robe & direct access to the shady front verandah, another extra large bedroom offers original open fire place & access to the verandah, plus the other 2 bedrooms offer excellent storage & space for teenagers. The home offers 11 foot ceilings, hardwood timber polished floorboards, double hung windows, red gum timber kitchen with stainless steel double oven & 3 separate spacious living zones. Outside there is plenty of space to pursue your hobby farm interests, with a couple of small paddock enclosures, a dam, huge barn, carport & plenty of parking space. Relax on the decking area which overlooks this private haven & you will be glad you made your move to the hills! Call us & inspect today!
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure the open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
Great Affordable Starter!
Looking for an affordable entry into the market? This is it! Conveniently located within walking distance to the Hills town of Cockatoo this property has great potential. Offering 3 bedrooms with built in robes, dual access bathroom for convenience, good sized living room and open plan kitchen and dining. Features include floorboards, mains gas heating and cooking and ceiling fans in the lounge and Master for comfort in the warmer months. Outside the front of the home has an undercover balcony, the perfect spot to enjoy the elevated tree outlook and the tiered rear yard is fully fenced and has established gardens with a lovely feature stone retaining wall. For vehicles there is a sealed driveway and a double lock up garage/workshop. At this price this property will appeal to first home owners and investors alike and will sell quickly.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Description:
Home Amongst the Tree Tops!
Nestled amongst tree ferns, native shrubs and gum trees is this split level family home on three quarters of an acre within minutes of Emeralds shops, public transport, restaurants and cafes. Unique in its design the home offers 4 bedrooms, the Master located separately upstairs with ensuite and walk in robe with leafy outlook. Downstairs is split level with 3 bedrooms, 2 with built in robes, a large lounge room and meals area off the kitchen. The kitchen is spacious and modern with gas cooktop and ample storage. From here you access the undercover decked entertaining area from which you can relax and take in the peaceful vista. Features of the home include slate flooring, mains gas ducted heating and well as a cosy wood heater. Outside there is plenty of under house storage, veggie patch, chicken coup, garden and wood sheds and the gardens are attractive and natural. Given its location and price, this home will be popular to a wide variety of purchasers and will not be on the market long.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Grant Day 0417 565 745 or Bethany Day 0438 844 968

Description:
VIEWS, LOCATION & A HOME YOU WILL LOVE!
Offered for sale for the first time in many years this ranch style brick home is ready to welcome a new family. Situated in a sought after location just off Paternoster Road, the views from this fantastic property will not disappoint! Inside the home offers plenty of character with combustion stove cooking, parquetry flooring, open fire place & expansive views from the balcony, living areas & 3 of the 4 bedrooms. There are 2 seperate living areas plus a seperate dining area, gas ducted heating plus there is plenty of room to relax on either the front & rear verandahs. Its evident throughout that this has been a very much loved family home just needing some love & attention to restore its former glory. Set on over 1/2 an acre, there is plenty of parking space, a double steal garage & plenty of privacy to be enjoyed! Call today, this one will sell fast!

Description:
Private Paradise with Views & A Pony Paddock!
Sitting on a private three quarters of an acre with a huge undercover deck with distant views, ideal for entertaining, this classic 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom cedar home offers location & lifestyle. Just a few minutes from Emerald or Cockatoo the home has 3 robed bedrooms, the Master with ensuite & an open plan kitchen & dining area overlooking the spacious lounge with toasty wood heater & there is mains gas ducted heating for added comfort & convenience. Add to this vaulted timber ceilings, plenty of windows welcoming an abundance of natural light & a well-appointed timber kitchen with stainless gas stove & electric oven. Outside there is a double garage + workshop with concrete floor, a wood shed & 3 small paddocks ideal for your pony or a sheep or two. Add to this the convenience of mains gas & water & this is an affordable home that ticks all the boxes!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Description:
Nature Lovers Retreat on approx 2 Private Acres!
This unique home oozes the charm of the Hills & is very privately located at the end of a no through road on nearly 2 acres, (consisting of 3 titles). Featuring towering gum trees, tree ferns, 100 year old rhododendrons & a variety of wildlife, you will wake to the sound of the birds in & the tranquillity will have you starting the day feeling refreshed. The home is built of rendered straw bales & timber offering warmth & character. The flexible floorplan has 2/3 bedrooms, the lovely Master is large & airy with a cosy wood heater, separate dressing room or perhaps nursery & from the Master you access the mezzanine level with leafy outlook & balcony, perfect as a retreat or perhaps home office/study, or maybe make it the third bedroom with a bit of tweaking. Add to this the kitchen with a perfect blend of modern cabinetry mixed with handmade timber bench tops as well as stone benches, stainless appliances, dishwasher & a walk in pantry & a contemporary bathroom with freestanding bath. Indoor features include vaulted timber ceilings, handmade doors, polished Cypress & Baltic timber floors, exposed beams, mains gas ducted heating for comfort & convenience & there's a wood heater set into a feature stone fire place for cosy nights in. Outside there's a balcony & large deck for entertaining & a separate studio privately located away from the home with a mezzanine level & power & water available which is suitable for a myriad of uses. The property has all mains services connected & an abundance of glass & skylights bringing the sunshine & natural outlook in. Escape the rat race & explore the walking tracks through to Cockatoo Township. Arrange your inspection today!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Samantha Scott 0438 680 032

Description:
Spacious Split Level Home!
At the top of a quiet street this spacious home situated on a useable 967m2 (1/4 ACREA approx) allotment with a northerly aspect has so much to offer the first home buyer, investor or those downsizing. The home offers 3 bedrooms (2 with BIRs), solid timber kitchen with views to the backyard and a fantastic open plan lounge, plus large separate dining area and family bathroom with BI spa bath. Enjoy the great outdoors from the covered entertaining area, whilst taking in the beautiful valley views. There is a lot to like in this comfortable home, which includes gas ducted heating, polished timber floors, double LU garage and double tandem carport. The property is fully fenced and is large enough for you to enjoy without lots of garden maintenance. This is the perfect opportunity to purchase a great home in an excellent location.
Due to strong market conditions please call before the open to confirm that the property is still available for sale.

Fantastic First Home!
Located in a central location of Cockatoo, this solid Hardiplank home is perfect for the first home buyer or investor. The home offers two bedrooms, great open plan living, light and bright kitchen and compact renovated bathroom. Extra features are polished flooring to lounge, reverse cycle air conditioning and slow combustion wood heater PLUS Double LU garage, double carport and plenty of under house storage. Situated on a fully fenced quarter acre of gently sloping land with lovely outlook over surrounding hills and only a short walk to main street and primary school. Be quick for this one!!

Description:
Private, Contemporary Home with Views!
You'll love this quality contemporary home, beautifully styled and privately located at the end of a cul de sac with views of the hills beyond and garden views from all living areas and bedrooms. Offering 4 bedrooms or 3 plus study, all with robes the Master with walk in robe and ensuite, formal lounge and open plan dinning, kitchen and family room. The spacious well-appointed kitchen features gas cooking, double drawer dishwasher and plenty of storage and bench space. The adjacent family room with wood heater opens out to the large undercover entertaining area decorated with a tropical feel, the perfect place for family and friends to gather or simply relax and take in the serene garden and hill views. Features include mains gas ducted heating, split system cooling and new quality window furnishings throughout. Cars and storage is covered with a double lock up garage and another 4 car garage with mezzanine storage as well as a separate studio or teenagers retreat, both garages have sealed driveway access for convenience. The gardens are established, beautifully maintained and are all fully fenced for the safety of the kids or fury friends.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Description:
Stylish Home on over 1 acre!
Dreams really do come true when you see for yourself the possibilities this stunning property provides! Perfectly positioned on a private and picturesque allotment of over 1 acre is this charming character weatherboard home that offers the ultimate in hills lifestyle for you and your family. Boasting a classic renovation throughout, the home exudes a warm & welcoming atmosphere from the moment you enter. The modern well-appointed kitchen will impress with Caesar stone waterfall bench tops, Blanco 900mm stove & Butler's pantry. The home offers excellent living spaces that provide plenty of room for both formal and informal living. There is a large lounge that offers a cosy wood heater, a comfortable family room plus a separate dining room all of which offer 3m high ceilings & large windows that frame the leafy setting that surrounds & allow plenty of natural light to shine through. The home boasts 4 extra large bedrooms with the master featuring walk-through robe, full ensuite and parents retreat complete with open fire place and private balcony. There are 2 beautifully renovated bathrooms, polished timber flooring, gas ducted heating plus split system heating & cooling to ensure year round comfort. Entertaining will be a breeze whether it is on the huge covered private decking space or convert the separate mancave into a real haven. There is another separate bungalow which would be ideal for sleepovers, working from home or a meditation retreat for you & your family. There is also a large secure workshop, plenty of parking, low maintenance gardens, fenced yard & dual road access. This really is a property that offers it all – we dare you to find better! Inspect today!
Due to strong market conditions please call before the open to confirm that it is still going ahead.

Description:
Great Family Home on 1 1/3 Acre!
Offered for sale is this family home well located within walking distance to Cockatoo shops, cafes and public transport and an easy 10 minute drive to Emerald or 20 minutes to Pakenham. Featuring 4 bedrooms, 2 located at one end of the home with an adjoining rumpus room, family bathroom, powder room, large family and dining room and galley kitchen with modern stainless appliances. For the entertainer there is an undercover outdoor pergola and a balcony out the front so you can catch the sun at all times of the day. Indoor features include gas ducted heating, ceiling fans and a new evaporative cooling system. For the gardener there's loads of potential and various shedding suitable for a myriad of uses and cars are not forgotten with a double carport out the front. Add to this 5kw of solar power, circular driveway and the fact that the house is set way back from the road to assure privacy and you have a great family home.

Description:
LIVE OUTSIDE THE BOX
Bursting with character and charm this delightful 2 story cottage offers you all the comforts of todays living while allowing you to take advantage of the peace and tranquility of a more simplistic lifestyle . Comprising of 4 bedrooms, master with built in robe and balcony access. The 2 additional upstairs bedrooms also access the balcony, while the remaining 4th bedroom is located downstairs. Enjoy 2 newly renovated bathrooms ,Modern kitchen and 2 separate living areas.
Outside you'll find an impressive decked area. from here you access the large shed/studio .
Bask in the serenity of your own pergola/summer house surrounded by the picturesque hills of Cockatoo. This unique property comes with 2985m2 of bush land to enjoy and explore while still giving you the convenience of only a short drive into nearby townships.
Additional features include -
Natural Gas Heating
Plumbed sewage
Garden shed
Hand made mud bricks
Exposed timber beams
This could be the change of pace you've been looking for , Inspect today .

Description:
Immaculately Presented & Affordable!
This family home on 1/3 of an acre is immaculately presented and located just moments from Cockatoo Township or 10 minutes up the road to Emerald. Offering 3 bedrooms with built in robes plus a study, lovely new family bathroom, spacious lounge and dining room. The as new kitchen is light and bright and features stone benchtops, dishwasher, freestanding stainless gas cooktop and ample storage. Features include gas ducted heating, split system cooling, polished floorboards, new carpet throughout and an undercover outdoor entertaining area with concrete floor. If you would like to work from home or have a teenager there is a studio/office which has a split system for comfort and its own phone line for convenience. Add to this a double lockup garage, plenty of off street parking and an established garden which captures lots of sun and a lush green lawn.

Description:
Treasured Retreat with Loads of Potential!
If you're looking for an escape from the hustle and bustle, it doesn't get much better than this three bedroom, two bathroom sanctuary nestled at the foot of a tranquil bushland reserve!
Topping the list of families, renovators, and developers alike, this treasured home set on a sprawling over approximately half of an acre of land instantly charms with hardwood floors and timber-lined walls, a spacious living with a fireplace, dedicated dining, classy kitchen featuring a stainless steel splashback, dual sink, and quality appliances (incl. a 900 mm gas cooktop), family zone, private study, three well-sized bedrooms (two with BIRs), two modern bathrooms (both with separate bath and shower), private toilet, and laundry.
An enormous front yard and a generous back garden present a potential hard to match, to build further accommodation whether as a bigger family home, holiday retreat, or even a charming B&B (STCA). Additional highlights include a front balcony, ramp access to the residence, ducted heating, main gas plumbing, and 2 x garages/storage sheds (1 double, 1 single) with bitumen driveway access.
Wonderfully located with easy access to Cockatoo Reserve, Wright Forest Bushland Reserve, and Cockatoo train station; it is also close to Cockatoo Primary School and Emerald Secondary College.
